channel.title: Help jarring a matrix 718
channel.description:
Hey guys I know this may seem stupid, but I got problems making my client into a .jar. I watched about 10 tutorials, passed hours on the net searching for a solution but it's still not working. I do what they say, I tried with my logic, but maybe I'm just too stupid :P. The jar just doesn't open... Sorry for my English, I habitually speak French. I really need help guys...
Here's the compiler code of the client, if it can help... @echo off title Client Compiler echo starting... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_45/bin/javac" -cp lib/*; -d bin -sourcepath src src/*.java @pause

item.title: Help jarring a matrix 718
item.dc:creator: @xX4m4zingXx xX4m4zingXx
item.description:
@xX4m4zingXx wrote:

don’t post the client compiler
post the client loader(run.bat)

Read full topic

item.title: Help jarring a matrix 718
item.dc:creator: @Drcode Drcode
item.description:
@Drcode wrote:

[quote=“Gambling, post:1, topic:538209”]Hey guys I know this may seem stupid, but I got problems making my client into a .jar. I watched about 10 tutorials, passed hours on the net searching for a solution but it’s still not working. I do what they say, I tried with my logic, but maybe I’m just too stupid :P. The jar just doesn’t open… Sorry for my English, I habitually speak French. I really need help guys…

Here’s the compiler code of the client, if it can help…
@echo off
title Client Compiler
echo starting…
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_45/bin/javac” -cp lib/; -d bin -sourcepath src src/.java
@pause[/quote]

I personally jar with eclipse because its so much easier and faster…
Link to Tut on how to jar with eclipse - http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/tutorials/508576-how-create-executable-jar-using-eclipse.html

But if you prefer to jar with jarmaker link is - http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/tutorials/466541-noob-friendly-how-jar-sign-your-rsps-client-noob-friendly.html

Just follow steps by steps with no rush and i bet you will get it right. If that don’t work just explain to me the problem your having and i or someone else will help.

Read full topic
